name: RED MAN FOLLOWS
description:
DaatOS@Binah:~$ init qli -1

daataql> USE HappyCorp_daatabase;
-> SELECT log FROM Abnromalities.RedMan;
1 row in set (0.0001 sec)

> What is the “Red Man” abnormality?

LOG:


The Red Man.
This abnormality is said to look like a giant humanoid wearing a red suit, have pale skin and no face. This creature seems to cause others to become violent when they're in pain, they can't control their actions once this happens. The only way to stop it would be to m̵̨̪̳͚͆͊͒͂̈ͅɒ̴̢̰͖̮̳̀͊͒̽̑ʞ̸̨͓̩̝̈́̏̈́̃̃͜ǝ̸̡̢͇̞͕̉́̀̎̚ ̵̰͎̮̟͈̒̀͗̋̚i̵̩͙̮̘̠͌͐̇̕͠Ɉ̶͙̦͓̫͖͐̾̈́͘͝ ̴̨̢̬͇̜͒͗̃͛͋ʇ̵̧̠̳̘͇͋͋̊̍̈ǝ̵̭̗̭̝͇̂͛̓̂͠ǝ̵̥̟̥͍̯̍̾̆͗̾l̸̢͉̮̯̮̐̿̾͘͝ ̵̡̡̛̠͓̟̆͑̂͝ɒ̴̧͙̫̦͇̔̀̒̂͘ϱ̴̻͎͓̰̪͊̅͒̏͝ɒ̷̧͓̯̦̻͋͗́̋͝i̶͍͔̖̙̩͐̽͊̀̅n̸̢̡͈̦͙͛̍́̿͠ ̵̮͚͖̪̜̂̒͑̆͝o̵̢̘̱͇̞͋̈́̓̚͝ɿ̶̞̺̰̖͖̈̎͑̀̚ ̷̧̡̡̭̺͆̀̂̐̉ʞ̴͔̳̻̳̥͑͂̄̓͘i̴̞̟͎͇̘͐̒̐̀̕l̴̢̛͈͖̤̐̈̍͠ͅl̵̳̫͖͓͓̑̍̈̽͑ ̸̡̘̲̯͇́͊̀͘͠(̶̠̙͎͈͇̇͗̑̉͠ ̴̨͎̳͕͇́͊̽͂̕“̸̢̘͈͈̟̈́̆̒̐͛q̴͉̭̜̝͇̔͐̌͂̓υ̴̧̮̮̻̖͒́̈́̂͐ɿ̸̡̱̳͓͙̄̀́͑͘i̵̺͉̝̫̞̎͒͊͊͘ʇ̴̨̦̰̮̪͂͛̑̔͆γ̴͙̞̠͖̦̉̉̍̽̚”̴̧̺̯̟͔̍̍̅͠͠ ̶̞̯̖̺͔̈̊̍̾͗)̴̛͍̣̖̏́͋̂͜ͅ ̶̨͓̻̜͓͛̍̐̒͘Ɉ̵̜̮̹̭̯̿̎̇͠͝ʜ̷̨̞̼̝͔̋̀̄̄͝ǝ̴̨͉͉̙̜̒̂͋̾̅m̶̭͉̲̬̫̅̾͌̚͝.̴̣̫̠͕̮͛̌̆̎̋

Encounters with this abnormality are extremely rare, its existence is still in debate. There were very few cases reported before the first “encounter” at The Happy Corporation.

Since then, more cases have come to light, though none have ever been solved.

There has been one, very old, documented case of a child surviving an encounter with the “Red Man”, but no definitive answer seems likely to ever be found. This leads to the belief that the Red Man is simply a product of one's imagination or a hallucination.

Most department leaders at The Happy Corporation agree that a “Red Man” could be a very dangerous and unpredictable abnormality of type “Atzilut”. This means, If it does exist, ̶D̶O̶ ̶N̶O̶T̶ ̶i̶n̶t̶e̶r̶a̶c̶t̶,̶ ̶a̶v̶o̶i̶d̶ ̶c̶o̶n̶f̶r̶o̶n̶t̶a̶t̶i̶o̶n̶,̶ ̶e̶s̶c̶a̶p̶e̶ ̶a̶t̶ ̶a̶l̶l̶ ̶c̶o̶s̶t̶s̶!̶ ̶

⭑⭑⭑★✪ We should try and show him the light again. Wouldn't you agree? ✪★⭑⭑⭑
